Package com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl.layouts

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicAbstractLayout<Rend,Pos,Scalar extends java.lang.Comparable<Scalar>>
    Basic base class for all Layouts.
    BasicLinearLayout<Rend,Pos,Scalar extends java.lang.Comparable<Scalar>>
    Basic layout for arranging Elements in line.
    PrimitivePositionalLayout<Rend,Pos,Scalar extends java.lang.Comparable<Scalar>>
    The most basic and primitive implementation of BasicAbstractDrawable, that has the child positions set directly and doesn't apply any logic for restraining its children to not exceed the borders set to the layout.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BasicLinearLayout.LayoutTooShortException
    Thrown by BasicLinearLayout on children positions recomputation when the children don't fit into the layout
